100.message-text-box: Encoder re-connection occurred. Please check your encoder logs

101.message-log: Detected incoming actual bitrate ({{incomingBitrate}} Kbps) is different from declared one ({{configuredBitrate}} Kbps). Make sure your encoder is configured to use CBR (constant bitrate)
101.message-text-box: Detected incoming actual bitrate ({{incomingBitrate}}) is different from declared one ({{configuredBitrate}}). Make sure your encoder is configured to use CBR (constant bitrate)

102.message-text-box: Audio track has been dropped from your broadcast. Check your encoder logs

103.message-text-box: Video track has been dropped from your broadcast. Check your encoder logs

104.message-log: Incoming video rate is too slow
104.self-serve-message-log: Incoming video rate is too slow, please check your bandwidth.
104.message-text-box: Incoming video rate is too slow - we are not receiving enough video to maintain smooth streaming. Viewers may experience buffering. Please check your encoder CPU, available bandwidth and consider to reduce the bitrate in your encoder configuration

107.message-log: Detected key frame interval/GOP length is {{actualKeyFrameInterval}} seconds
107.message-text-box: Detected key frame interval/GOP length is {{actualKeyFrameInterval}} seconds. Recommended value is 2 seconds.

108.message-text-box: High FPS detected {{frameRate}}. Recommended value is up to 30 frames per second.

109.message-log: No Data is received on the primary endpoint

110.message-log: No Data is received on the primary endpoint
110.self-serve-message-log: No data is received on the primary endpoint. Recording is disabled.
110.message-text-box: No data is received on the primary endpoint. Broadcasting to the primary endpoint is mandatory for recording to operate.

111.message-text-box: Authentication failed: wrong token {{parameter}}. Please check your encoder settings and try again

112.message-text-box: Authentication failed: Incorrect stream name/key {{parameter}}. Please check your encoder settings and try again.

113.message-log: Authentication failed: entry {{entryId}} does not exist
113.message-text-box: Authentication failed: entry {{entryId}} does not exist. Please check your settings and try again

114.message-log: Live streaming is disabled on your account
114.message-text-box: Live streaming is disabled on your account. please contact Kaltura for more details

115.message-log: Live stream quota has been exceeded
115.message-text-box: Live stream quota has been exceeded. please contact Kaltura for more details.

116.message-log: Frame rate is fluctuating on flavor ({{Flavor}}). Last: {{lastFrameRate}}, Average: {{meanFrameRate}}
116.message-text-box: Frame rate is fluctuating on flavor ({{Flavor}}). Please check your encoder CPU and reduce FPS (frame per second) and resolution accordingly.

117.message-log: Frame rate of {{actualFrameRate}} is different than configured {{configuredFrameRate}} on flavor ({{Flavor}})
117.message-text-box: Frame rate of {{actualFrameRate}} is different than configured on flavor ({{Flavor}}). Please check your encoder CPU and resolution accordingly.

118.message-text-box: Exceeded max encoded entries allowed, please contact support

123.message-text-box: Segment reported in m3u8 is with irregular duration

124.message-log: AStream framerate seem to fluctuate. Check source stream and encoder framerate stability

125.message-log: Number of connection requests exceeded permitted limit for entry id / IP {{param}}. Check your encoder and wait for a couple of minutes before trying to restore the stream.

126.message-log: New broadcast request received while the entry is already broadcasting
